name: One Bad Pig
description: '''One Bad Pig''' is an American [[Christian punk]] and metal crossover band from [[Austin, Texas]], which formed in 1985. The ''Encyclopedia of Contemporary Christian Music'' describes them as "quite possibly the most popular hard-punk act ever to arise within the Christian music scene." They were known for their mischief and irreverence on stage, as reflected even in their reunion at [[Cornerstone Festival|Cornerstone]] in 2000.
